mapper.select: SELECT * FROM documents WHERE req_id = #{req_id} AND checked = false AND (status = 1 OR status = 2);
SELECT * FROM documents WHERE appr_id = #{appr_id} AND status = 0;

SELECT d.*, req.emp_name req_name, appr.emp_name appr_name FROM documents d LEFT JOIN human_resource req ON req.emp_id = d.req_id LEFT JOIN human_resource appr ON appr.emp_id = d.appr_id WHERE d.doc_id = #{doc_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO documents (cat_id, tb_id, cd_id, req_id, req_date, title, content, appr_id, appr_date, status, comments, query) VALUES (#{cat_id}, #{tb_id}, #{cd_id}, #{req_id}, #{req_date}, #{title}, #{content}, #{appr_id}, #{appr_date}, #{status}, #{comments}, #{query})
mapper.update: UPDATE documents set status = #{status}, comments = #{comments} WHERE doc_id = #{doc_id}
UPDATE documents set checked = true WHERE doc_id = #{doc_id}
